original_text: Ahaz was the father of Jehoaddah, Jehoaddah was the father of Alemeth, Azmaveth and Zimri, and Zimri was the father of Moza.
korean_text: 아하스는 여호앗다를 낳고 여호앗다는 알레멧과 아스마?과 시므리를 낳고 시므리는 모사를 낳고

sentences.original_text: Ahaz was the father of Jehoaddah
Jehoaddah was the father of Alemeth
and Zimri was the father of Moza
